transcript:
Aapane jis vyakti ko call karichanti, se ebe anya call re vyasta achanti. Daya kari apeksha karantu kimba kichhi samaya pare chesta karantu. Aapane jis vyakti ko call ki.
Halo.
Han Pradeep ji namaskar sir.
Namaskar sir namaskar boliye sir. Ujjwal baat kar raha tha kaise hain aap? 
Bas badhiya hai sir aap kaise hain sir?
Bas badhiya badhiya. Main keh raha tha sir aapka renewal generate ho gaya hai sir India Mart wala.
Han ji sir.
Aage?
Kya bol rahe hain aap?
Sir aapka jo India Mart ka service chal rahi hai na. 
Han ji.
Uska renewal generate ho gaya hai sir.
Renewal generate ho gaya to April mahina mein hota hai.
Nahi nahi aapka renewal aap ek red check dekhiyega April mein nahi hai aapka May check chalega. 
Han ji. 
May check ek red check chalega nahi April mein nahi hai aapka khatam hoga March mein sir.
Han main wohi to bol raha hu March mein mane April se shuru mera mere paas to likha hua hai April. Likha hua hai woh sahi hai renewal generate ho gaya matlab teen char mahine pehle generate ho jata hai matlab client ko inform kar dete hain baki to.
Han.
Han to baki baat isliye maine aapko call kiya tha kyunki kya hamara price December se change ho raha hai.
Han. Thik hai sir to jo hamare existing client hai jinka renewal generate hone wala upcoming renewal hai to teen mahine pehle ka thik March tak ke to unko hum client ko phone karke bata rahe hain ki sir renewal generate ho gaya price hamare change ho rahe hain December se hamara jo site hai Indiamart.in aap agar online ho to pay.indiamart.in khologe to waha pe price change ho chuke hai update ho chuka hai thik. 
To jo aapne last mein price kam hua hai ki jyada hua hai?
Jyada ho gaya hai.
Achcha.
Han to ab ab aapki jo pehle aapne jo service li thi ab wo aagyi 50 40 li thi na aapne ek saal ki.
Hun hun hun. 
Ab wo ho gayi hai 50000 plus GST ki to isliye main aapko phone karke pehle bata raha hu ki sir abhi hamare paas offer chal raha hai wo main aapko matlab 45 plus GST pe dila sakta hu sir.
Achcha achcha thik hai thik hai mera mere ko khatam hone ke baad hi main lunga wo jo offer milega tabhi nahi bhi milega tab bhi. 
Mera renewal time aayega tabhi hum lenge.
Sir renewal time aayega thik hai main mana nahi kar raha hu wo to totally aapki marzi hai aap bilkul renewal time aayega tab lunga maine aapko phone isliye kiya ki dekho sir March pe agar aap renewal loge apna thik hai.
Hun. Hello to aap paise jyada paise jyada pay paise jyada pay karke loge abhi agar aap renewal lete ho to aapka same rate se ho jayega lekin jo aapka jo aapki service hai na wo March se hi start hogi matlab abhi se start nahi hogi ki agar aapne November December pe le liya aapki service abhi se start ho ja rahi hai. 
Nahi thik hai wo to main samajh gaya sir lekin humko wahi khatam hone usi period mein lenge. 
Usi mein agar us samay koi offer raha to thik hai nahi bhi raha to koi baat nahi.
Wo to aapki marzi sir dekhiye hamare paas offer aaya tha to hamara kaam tha ki hum apne clients ko jo hai unko update kar de. Thik hai isliye maine aapko call kiya ki taki aapko ye na ho ki aapko pata nahi tha aapko bataya nahi gaya. 
Ji ji ji. Isliye humne pre inform kiya baki total total aapki marzi hai aap chahe abhi lo chahe aap us pe March pe lijiyega jis date pe ho us date pe lijiyega hame koi dikkat nahi hai lekin hum ye cha rahe the na ki aapko update kar de taki kal aapko ye rahe ki ha ki aapko maine phone kiya karke bataya nahi ki aapka renewal update ho gaya. 
Nahi nahi nahi aapka service achcha hai aap Ujjwal ji aap bahut achcha politely baat bhi karte hain achcha lagta hai aapko koi dikkat nahi hai waise bahut achche hain aap achche se samjhate bhi hain.
Thik hai thik hai koi baat nahi.
Wo to wo to thik hai sir aur sir aapke jo do teen product hai na jaise mattress cover wagera ho gaya hai ha iski mapping bhi sahi karna hai to isko aaj to closing mein baitha hu thoda sa busy hu main thik hai sir main agar aap free ho to Monday ko phone karte hain main to sir aapka main aaj ka call lekar ke main system ke paas aake baith gaya. 
Achcha. Achcha thik hai sir thik hai dekh lijiyega aaiye nahi nahi to aap ho to abhi bhi abhi kar dete koi aisa nahi hai aap to jaise main system mein hi tha sir boliye na.
Achcha achcha achcha sir aap apna kholiye site uski India Mart wala. 
Han main khol ke baitha hu sir.
Main bhi open kar leta hu.
Ab jaise sir aapka dekhiye maine white towel wala to add kar diya tha aapka ek do product missing tha maine kal aapka add kar diya tha. 
Maine na kuch kuch cheeze change karna hai jo towel aap dekhiye first mein towel aa raha hai.
Ji. First jab main mera product ka profile khol raha hu.
Ji ji. Dekhiye usme na first towel aa raha hai.
White towel ha. Wo white towel ko usme first usme bedsheet rakhiye white bedsheet mane jo wo wo wo isliye aapko first pe dikh raha hai na isme kal kuch cheeze missing thi thik. 
To kal maine apne hand se photo to aapki ispe lagayi hai thik is wajah se ye aapko first pe dikh raha hai.
Nahi first page mein jo dikhega usi ka to jyada craze mana jata hai na sir. Nahi wo site pe hai ye is aapka jo panel pe dikh raha hai wo isliye kyunki kal humne ispe update kiya tha.
Achcha thik hai aap isko ek kam kariye aapke site pe jab aapka koi site open karega na iska jo price rate hai na sir isko kaise kiya jata hai ek bar bataiye to hum isko modify mane kaise price mere ko jaise change karna hai. 
Price jaise price change karna aap laptop pe baithe ho right? 
Nahi main desktop mein baitha hu.
Han desktop pe baithe ho jaha pe price likha hoga uske bagal pe pencil ka option aa raha hai.
Uske bagal mein pencil na to. Chhoti si pen type ka bana hoga pencil ya pen. 
Han han. Uspe click karo aap. Thik hai price wala tab open ho jayega. 
Hua?
Ji sir. Ho gaya. Han to us pe ab aap price jo bhi naya price hai usko likh ke update kar dijiye update ho jayega. 
Ho gaya isko kar diya abhi ye wala kya aaya second wala bhi same hi towel hai sir. 
Han to second wale alag alag hai kyunki maine dekha aap bathroom towel se bhi pehli aati to aap utha lete ho white cotton bathroom towel aati tab bhi dono same hai lekin naam alag alag hai jaise koi agar bathroom towel se search karta hai tab bhi aap dikh rahe ho thik white cotton towel se search karega tab bhi aap dikhoge. 
Achcha ye poly cotton hospital bedsheet ho gaya ye poly cotton white towel likhiye sir hospital bedsheet nahi ye hotel bedsheet hai sir. 
Hotel thik hai hotel bedsheet hi hai hotel bedsheet hai iska kya price rakha hai 395 isko bhi change karna hai isko. 
Isko hotel bedsheet dal do sir. 
Han hotel bedsheet hi likha hua hai sir. Category mein hotel bedsheet hi dala hai humne. 
Han sir maine price change kar diya isme 245 kar diya price change kar do photo kuch nayi nayi aur laga dijiye. 
Photo kaise update karke kaise lagana hai profile mein ja kar ke ki kaise karna hai. Nahi jaha pe jaha pe aap photos aa rahi hogi uske bagal dekhiye camera ka option bana hoga jaise camere pe jaoge na waha pe add ka option aayega hai na. 
Achcha add pe jaoge plus pe karoge waha pe aayega blue green colour ka upload photo from your computer jaise open karoge to aapki computer ki gallery khul jayegi waha se aap select karke photo laga dijiye. 
Ye sab cheeze na ek din baith ke aaram se main aapko Monday Tuesday mein video call pe samjhata hu sari cheeze. 
Ok sir thik hai thik hai thik hai thik hai. 
Han na thoda sa aur bhi kuch chhoti chhoti cheeze hai update karna wo main aunga online to behtar tarike se kar payenge. 
Ji sir thik hai. Aaj thoda sa busy hai sir isiliye matlab thik hai sir aaj actually na update kafi logo ko karna hai sir. 
Ok sir ok. Ye sari cheeze main aapko aaram se ek din video meet pe aate hai kyuki mere ko category mapping karni hai ye sari cheeze kar ke aapko maine batana hai to ye sari cheeze main karta hu aur aapko sari cheeze update deta hu. Kuch cheeze main dekh raha tha out of stock hai usse bhi sahi karni hai ek do product ki hamari mapping line hai usse bhi correct karna hai catalog score being increase karwana hai thik ye sara cheez hai ye thoda time taking hai 10-15 minute tak aapko main Tuesday connect karta hu sir iske liye. 
Thik hai sir thik hai. Ok Pradeep ji sir ek bar kahiye to main proposal bhej du soch ke bata lijiyega aapke liye hai sir main. 
Bhej ke rakhiye change kar lenge sir bhej ke rakhiye. Sir sir dekhiye dekhne ka time nahi hai aaj hamari closing hai thik sir matlab kal hame tag karna hai paisa thik hai jo purana rate hai abhi jaise aapne last year jab aapne jo kara tha usi pe waise hi chal raha hai ab closing time pe upar niche wohi ho raha hai to abhi aapko matlab jo purana rate India Mart pe tha abhi tak ka usi rate pe dila dunga December se price hamare naye change ho ke aa rahe hain isliye main keh raha tha aapko. 
Thik hai. Kyunki dekho sir agar service leni hai char mahine baad usi cheez ka hum jyada paisa khote hain wohi cheez jab abhi hum kar sakte hain wo char mahine baad se hi chalegi aisa nahi main aap se ye keh raha hu ki sir service aaj se main chala dunga char mahine to aapki purani bachi wo to chalegi us pe hamara ek saal ka aur add ho jayega. 
Ji. Matlab abhi aap kar rahe the to aap samajh lo 2027 March tak aap fursat ho jaoge. 
Thik hai sir. Agar ek saal ka plan karte ho agar do teen saal ka plan karte ho to us pe aur achcha discount hai price ab main apne senior se baat karata hu uske liye. 
Thik thik hai. To bataiye kuch hai man abhi ki baad mein dekhoge aap. 
Nahi abhi kuch man nahi hai sir aap bhej ke rakhiye hum decide karke batayega. Sir dekhiye ab dekhiye sir decide karne pe jitna delay hoga matlab bhejne ka matlab ye hai ki maine aaj aapko bheja aapne aaj kal mein confirm kar diya to sahi bhi hai thik sir ab wo cheez main aapko bhej du fir aapka jab renewal aap us time pe kahenge ki Ujjwal ji aapko aapne to mere ko is rate pe bola tha is pe is ye cheez aap offer kar rahe the ab kyun nahi kar rahe to sir meri baat bhi kharab hogi na ki maine aapko bola wo commit nahi kar paya. 
Hun hun. Thik hai sales mein to sir yahi cheez hoti hai na jis time jo offer rehta hai us time aapko mil jata hai itna achcha ho payega jyada se jyada wo price hum aapko karwa sakte hain. 
Ji sir. Han to isiliye main keh raha tha agar aap ek saal ka plan kar rahe ho to bata do do teen saal ka plan kar rahe ho to us hisab se main aapko achcha sa achcha price jo ho sakta hai wo de kyunki sir dekhiye aap abhi system pe baithe ho aap. 
Ji. Ek bar sir aap mere channel pe pay.indiamart.com kholiye. 
Kya kholna hai? Pay likhiye Google pe jaiye likhiye pay ji ek to side mein kam kar raha hu main aap mere ko message karke rakh dijiye. 
Sir ek minute lagega sir ek minute lagega jyada time mere ko WhatsApp mein ye ye page mein chala jaunga na fir mera pura aana hi mushkil hai ye kam mein ho na aap mujhe apna wo message karke rakh dijiye main aapko baad mein dekh kar ke aapko update de dunga. 
To aap abhi matlab aap ek bar number bata dijiye apna WhatsApp wala sir. 8910 89 10 46 46 8181 8181 dekhiye sir main aapko bhej de raha wo site ka site bhej de raha ek bar aap site pe price check kar lijiye uske baad aap mere ko aaj hi reply back kar dijiyega agar agar aapka man ho raha ho to agar dekhiye final agar matlab aapko ye ho raha hai ki ha aaj kal mein hum confirm kar dete hain to aap bataiyega jo sabse best price ho payega na wo main aapko kara dunga ek saal do saal teen saal ek saal ka thoda mahanga padta hai do se teen saal mein aap jaoge to aap agar monthly wise dekhoge na to aapko price mein bahut fayda milega. 
Thik hai sir thik hai thik hai han to aap mere ko please update kar dijiyega. Thik hai maine aapko WhatsApp kar diya ek bar aapke paas aa gaya hoga. 
Ji sir. Ok. Phone number lagega aap phone number apna dal doge na aapko price dikh jayenge aapke. 
Ji thik ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Renewal price is increasing from December.

- Wants to change the product category and price.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about the price change.

- Executive explained the process of changing price.

- Executive shared the website link on WhatsApp.

- Executive will connect on Tuesday for category mapping.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the proposal and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, price, category, update, offer
